name: Cirno's Sky Chase
description:
This tiny game was made for a previous year's Cirno Day(9/9/2016). 

This game has very basic local multiplayer support. Just plug in some gamepads and you can control the other Cirnos. You can also use the keyboard to play as player 1 if you want.

───Controls───

Arrow Keys = Move
Space = Drop Blocks

───Game Modes───

Endless Survival: You only get 3 lives in this mode. Battle an ever growing army of relatively weak Cirnos, to try to get as a high a score as possible. To make this mode easier to play, you are given a hover ability which activates any time you would normally fall, allowing a very brief moment for you to recover. Survival Match: Each player is given 9 lives, the game ends when only 1 player is left. The arena shrinks each time a player loses all their lives. Timed Match: You play for the amount of time you select, the player with the highest number of kills when the timer ends, wins.

Shooting a UFO gives you a temporary power-up.

───UFOs───

Red: Triple row shot Green: Fast row shot Blue: Fast movement speed
